commissions.title: Monthly Commission System
commissions.subtitle: Manage and calculate employee commissions professionally

instruction1.title: System Overview
instruction1.description: The system allows you to accurately track monthly payments and commissions for your organization, ensuring transparency and efficiency in managing dues.

instruction2.title: Employee Setup
instruction2.description: First, start by adding employees from the 'HR Management' page, choosing the package type (commission) and filling in the data to be automatically included here.

instruction3.title: Customize Commissions
instruction3.description: Flexibly define the type of commission (fixed daily/monthly amount or percentage) for each employee according to company policy.

instruction4.title: Table Control
instruction4.description: An interactive interface that allows you to delete employees or modify their data, with the ability to select all or exclude unselected ones before saving.

instruction5.title: Archiving and Saving
instruction5.description: When saving data, it is stored in 'Saved Groups' for later reference and to track payment status independently.

instruction6.title: Update Payment Status
instruction6.description: After saving the report, you can update the payment status (Paid/Pending) with a single click to organize cash flows.

instruction7.title: Smart Messaging System
instruction7.description: The system automatically sends a payment receipt when paid, or a professional and polite claim notification if the status is 'Pending'.

instruction8.title: Advanced Administrative Tools
instruction8.description: Take advantage of professional printing features, data export, and precise follow-up of all details in the commissions department.
